alerts.title: Delhi: Yamuna Flood Alert
alerts.message: URGENT: Yamuna river level rising. Evacuate Yamuna Bank area immediately to Nearest School Shelter.

alerts.title: Delhi: Laxmi Nagar Watch
alerts.message: WATCH: Water logging in Laxmi Nagar streets. Residents should stay indoors and clear drains.

alerts.title: Bihar: Patna Coastal Warning
alerts.message: CRITICAL: Ganga river surge expected. People near Patna coast should move to Higher College Ground.

alerts.title: Assam: Guwahati Basin Surge
alerts.message: URGENT: Sudden flood surge in Dispur area. Immediate evacuation required to Stadium Shelter.

alerts.title: Mumbai: Mithi River Overflow
alerts.message: DANGER: Mithi river overflow. Dharavi residents should move to Community Center immediately.

alerts.title: Kolkata: Hooghly Surge Advisory
alerts.message: ADVISORY: Hooghly river level stable but rising. Embankment monitoring active near Howrah.
